scripts.diag: node -e "console.log('node',process.version);" && npm -v && node -e "const fs=require('fs');console.log('has package.json:',fs.existsSync('package.json'));console.log('has astro.config.mjs:',fs.existsSync('astro.config.mjs'));if(fs.existsSync('astro.config.mjs')){console.log('\n--- astro.config.mjs ---\n'+fs.readFileSync('astro.config.mjs','utf8'));}" && npx astro --version
